4Head.description: This is the face of a popular Twitch streamer. twitch.tv/cadburryftw

ANELE.description: This is the face of Twitch Partnerships Lead Anele. twitch.tv/anele

ArgieB8.description: ArgieB8 is the face of Twitch Staff member Ignacio Estanga. twitch.tv/theargietv

ArsonNoSexy.description: This is the face of streamer ArSon. twitch.tv/arson

AsianGlow.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member Eliene Sun. twitch.tv/eleinetv

BabyRage.description: Common meme spurring from Dota 2 professional player and Twitch streamer Arteezy (RTZ) who gets mad when bad things happen in his games, and rages.

BatChest.description: The BatChest face belongs JhnnyCrwsh, part of the Twitch moderation team. It refers to how his chest hair looks like the Bat Symbol, and came about from a dumb highlight on his channel. twitch.tv/JhnnyCrwsh

BCWarrior.description: This is the face of streamer Zeke. twitch.tv/ezekiel_iii

BibleThump.description: This is an icon from the game The Binding of Isaac.

BlargNaut.description: This is the face of streamer Aria Blarg. twitch.tv/ariablarg

BloodTrail.description: This is an icon of the main character in the game Super Meat Boy.

BrainSlug.description: This is a Brain Slug. It controls your thoughts. Originally this was the face of Bwana, part of the Twitch moderation team. It was changed to be an actual Brain Slug due to racist abuse of this emote. More info: twitch.tv/bwana/c/2151897

BrokeBack.description: This is the face of streamer Alan. twitch.tv/seriousgaming

BuddhaBar.description: This is the face of Yoh, a JavaScript nerd who works on social features for Twitch.

DAESuppy.description: This is the face of famous Starcraft 2 player, EG.Suppy.

DansGame.description: This is the face of Dan. twitch.tv/dansgaming

DatSheffy.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member Sheffy. twitch.tv/sheffy

DBstyle.description: This is the face of streamer and composer Dannybstyle. twitch.tv/dannybstyle

deIlluminati.description: This is a promotional emote for Deus Ex: Mankind Divided.

DendiFace.description: This is the face of Danil "Dendi" Ishutin a professional Dota2 player. The emote is a temporary (https://twitter.com/Trancez0r/status/534501083796611073) prize given to the winner of the Twitch Doube Trouble tournament. Although Dendi's team didn't actually win the tournament, the prize was graciously(?) given to Dendi by the winner. (https://twitter.com/Trancez0r/status/534501692285673472). The code itself is reference to what trolls use for the WinWaker emote.

DogFace.description: DogFace is the face of Kyle Pulver, an indie game developer that added :dogface: to Steam.

duDudu.description: This is a representation of the popular song Sandstorm by Darude. The code is commonly spammed in chat whenever Sandstorm is played.

EagleEye.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member Jacob.

EleGiggle.description: This is the face of Twitch streamer Elegy of Games. twitch.tv/elegyofgames

FailFish.description: This is the face of streamer SpamFish. twitch.tv/spamfish

FPSMarksman.description: This is the face of Nick Overton, streamer and former Twitch staff member. twitch.tv/immarksman

FrankerZ.description: This is the face of Frank the dog of Twitch staff member Ernest Le. Brother of RalpherZ.

FreakinStinkin.description: This is the face of GQ, part of the Twitch moderation team. twitch.tv/thegreatgq

FUNgineer.description: This is the face of Twitch engineer, Jon. twitch.tv/jbrhymer

FunRun.description: This is the icon of Justin Ignacio aka TheGunrun, Twitch staff member and savior of eSports! twitch.tv/thegunrun

GingerPower.description: This is the face of Dylan Reichstadt. He works for Twitch in quality assurance. twitch.tv/dylanlive

GrammarKing.description: This is the face of Twitch employee/KBMOD writer Vol1tion. twitch.tv/vol1tion

HassaanChop.description: This is the face of Twitch software engineer Hassaan. This emote was at one point known as 'DatHass'.

HassanChop.description: This is the face of Twitch Staff member Hassan. twitch.tv/hassan

HeyGuys.description: This is the face of Selen, director of recruiting at Twitch.

HotPokket.description: This is the face of streamer Pokket. twitch.tv/pokket

HumbleLife.description: This icon was added for Extra Life 2014 where gamers raise money for Children's Miracle Network Hospitals. Find out more at extra-life.org.

ItsBoshyTime.description: This is an icon from the game I Wanna Be the Boshy.

Jebaited.description: This is the face of Jebailey.

JKanStyle.description: This is the face of Justin Kan, co-founder of Justin.tv and Twitch.

JonCarnage.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member and caster Jon Carnage.

KAPOW.description: This is a promotional emote for the game Infinite Crisis.

Kappa.description: This is the face of Josh, a former Justin.tv employee. Kappa is generally used to indicate sarcasm or trolling.

KappaClaus.description: This is Kappa with a Santa hat added for Christmas 2015.

KappaPride.description: On June 26, 2015, the Supreme Court of the United States ruled that same-sex couples can marry nationwide. You can read the full decision at: http://www.supremecourt.gov/opinions/14pdf/14-556_3204.pdf The rainbow coloring is a symbol of the LGBT pride movement.

KappaRoss.description: In honor of the late Bob Ross's 73rd birthday and the official launch of the Creative directory, Twitch created this emote - a mashup of Kappa and Bob's distinctive hair. Twitch also ran a non-stop marathon of all 403 episodes of "The Joy of Painting" on twitch.tv/bobross

Keepo.description: Keepo is Kappa stylized as the hero Meepo from DotA/DotA 2.

KevinTurtle.description: This is the face of Klutch, part of the Twitch partnership team. twitch.tv/klutch

Kreygasm.description: This is the face of streamer Kreyg. twitch.tv/kreyg

Mau5.description: The Mau5 emote belongs to music producer Deadmau5. twitch.tv/deadmau5

mcaT.description: This is the logo of the music label Monstercat. twitch.tv/monstercat monstercat.com

MingLee.description: The face of Chris Mead, the Director of Partnerships EMEA at Twitch.

MrDestructoid.description: This is the mascot of the gaming website Destructoid. twitch.tv/destructoid

MVGame.description: This is the face of streamer MAN. twitch.tv/manvsgame

NinjaTroll.description: This is the face of streamer Ninja. twitch.tv/ninja

NoNoSpot.description: This is the face of streamer Towelliee. twitch.tv/towelliee

NotLikeThis.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member Ben Swartz. twitch.tv/bensw

OhMyDog.description: This is the face of the dog, Tank.

OMGScoots.description: This is the face of SirScoots, a well known member of the eSports community.

OneHand.description: This is the face of streamer EdwardStarcraft.

OpieOP.description: This is the face of Jason Babo. Strategic Partnerships at TwitchTV and a Web Developer. twitch.tv/opie

OptimizePrime.description: This is the face of Emmett Shear, co-founder of Justin.tv and CEO of Twitch.

OSfrog.description: This is a promotional emote for the Old Spice Nature Adventure where Twitch chat controlled a man's adventures in nature.

OSsloth.description: This is a promotional emote for the Old Spice Nature Adventure where Twitch chat controlled a man's adventures in nature.

panicBasket.description: This emote was voted into existence by the Twitch Townhall attendees during PAX Prime 2014. It is inspired by the phrase "PICNIC" (based on PANIC) spammed in chat when a stream goes offline during a broadcast.

PanicVis.description: This is the emote of Visual, part of the Twitch moderation team. Twitch.tv/visual

PartyTime.description: This is the face of Pluto, a partnership manager for Twitch. twitch.tv/pluto

PeoplesChamp.description: The PeoplesChamp emote belongs to Bobby 'Scar' of the smash community and of MeleeItOnMe. twitch.tv/meleeitonme

PermaSmug.description: This is the face of Aaron Krasnov, a product manager at Twitch, captured during their AHGL Dota team photo.

PicoMause.description: This is the face of streamer PicoMause. twitch.tv/picomause

PipeHype.description: The PipeHype emote is of Pipe, part of the Twitch support team. twitch.tv/pipe

PJSalt.description: PJ stands for PeacefulJay, a Fighting Game Community (FGC) stream: twitch.tv/peacefuljay and Salt is a term used in the FGC to describe someone who is upset.

PMSTwin.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member & PMS clan founder Amber Dalton.

PogChamp.description: This is the face of streamer Gootecks. twitch.tv/gootecks

Poooound.description: This is the face of streamer RSQViper. twitch.tv/RSQViper

PraiseIt.description: This is the icon for the Helix Fossil item in Pokemon games. It became a meme as part of the TwitchPlaysPokemon streams.

PRChase.description: This is the face of Twitch PR Director, Chase.

PunchTrees.description: This is an icon of Steve, the ingame persona in the game Minecraft. One of the first objectives in Minecraft is to punch trees to get wood.

PuppeyFace.description: This is the face of Clement "Puppey" Ivanov a professional Dota2 player. twitch.tv/puppey

RaccAttack.description: This is the avatar of Nick aka BlackLightAttack. Formerly of his personal channel, twitch.tv/blacklightattack, where raccoons are a recurring theme.

RalpherZ.description: This is the face of Ralph the dog of Twitch staff member Ernest Le. Brother of FrankerZ.

RedCoat.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member, Bill.

ResidentSleeper.description: This is the face of Oddler. Oddler was doing a 72 hour Resident Evil marathon when he fell asleep about 66 hours into it. His stream with him sleeping became massively popular and at one point the viewer count even reached 13,000. twitch.tv/oddler

riPepperonis.description: This is a symbol for "Rest In Pepperonis". "Rest In Pepperonis" is a middle of the herd term used to describe a death, usually on a video game.

RitzMitz.description: The emote RitzMitz is of RitzPlays. twitch.tv/ritzplays

RuleFive.description: This is the face of streamer Chuk. twitch.tv/whenchukattacks

SeemsGood.description: The face of staff member Paul Diamond, twitch.tv/bearcat

ShadyLulu.description: The face of Twitch Staff member Lauren Etner from Events/Marketing

ShazBotstix.description: This is the face of Ben Goldhaber, Twitch staff member and streamer. twitch.tv/fishstix

SmoocherZ.description: This is the emote of Jordan Tayer aka Soma, Influencer Relations Manager at Twitch. twitch.tv/soma

SMOrc.description: This is an icon from the game Space Marine.

SoBayed.description: This is the face of SONOS, Twitch staff member and streamer. twitch.tv/s0n0s

SoonerLater.description: This is the face of Sooner, a popular Twitch streamer. twitch.tv/lolsooner

SSSsss.description: This is an icon of a Creeper from the game Minecraft. They blow stuff up.

StoneLightning.description: This is the face of Michael Seibel, co-founder of Justin.tv.

StrawBeary.description: This is the icon of streamer LordKat. twitch.tv/lordkat

SuperVinlin.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member Kevin Lin.

SwiftRage.description: This is the face of streamer Swiftor. twitch.tv/swiftor

TF2John.description: This is the face of stream and Twitch staff member, John. twitch.tv/synwyn

TheRinger.description: This is the face of Kyle Vogt, co-founder of Justin.tv.

TheTarFu.description: This is the face of streamer Tarfu. twitch.tv/tarfu

TheThing.description: The emote "TheThing" is the face of Geoff "iNcontroL" Robinson. twitch.tv/incontroltv

ThunBeast.description: ThunBeast belongs to Twitch caster ThunderCast twitch.tv/Thundercast

TinyFace.description: This is the face of streamer, Foom. twitch.tv/king_foom

TooSpicy.description: This is the face of Miguel, part of the Twitch moderation team. twitch.tv/sournothardcore SourPls

TriHard.description: This is the face of speed runner Trihex. twitch.tv/trihex

UleetBackup.description: This is the face of streamer Crream. twitch.tv/crream

UncleNox.description: This is the face of Nox, part of the Twitch moderation team. Rumor is that he does not wear pants. twitch.tv/nox

UnSane.description: This is the face of streamer Tom. twitch.tv/unsanitylive

VoHiYo.description: This is the emote of Volary, a member of the Twitch partnerships team. twitch.tv/volary

WholeWheat.description: This is the face of caster and Twitch staff member djWHEAT. twitch.tv/djwheat

WutFace.description: This is the face of Twitch staff member Alex Mendez. twitch.tv/goldenboyftw

YouWHY.description: This is the emote of YouPickGames. twitch.tv/youpickgames
